synopsis.text: Cinderella Project, a new initiative by the renowned talent agency, 346 Production, is set to transform the lives of ordinary girls into those of aspiring idols. Uzuki Shimamura, a young student with dreams of becoming an idol, finds herself selected for this very project after her initial audition fails. However, the project is incomplete without two more members. Enter Rin Shibuya, who catches the eye of a 346 Productions' scout amidst a chaotic crowd. Despite initial reluctance, Rin, along with Mio Honda and eleven other girls, joins Uzuki to form the Cinderella Project. Their journey is filled with trials and tribulations, but with their sights set on sharing the stage with their idols, these girls are ready to climb the stairs to success at 346 Pro. The magic of their story unfolds as they embark on this life-changing adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
